title: Analog Glow Watch Face
summary: Analog watch face with a beautiful illumination.
description: CHRISTMAS SALE!SAVE -50%***Analog watch face with a beautiful illumination and 9 unique color skins:- emerald - the original,- amber,- amethyst,- jadeite,- ruby,- sapphire,- quartz,- citrine,- morganite.Designed for round and square devices.Additional features:- various design personalization possibilities with various number layouts and time ticks,- custom signature - type whatever you like,- watch and phone battery indicators,- date indicator.Designed for Android Wear.Supported smartwatches: LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Motorola Moto 360, Sony SmartWatch 3, Asus ZenWatch, Samsung Gear Live.ATEKTURA Watch Faces on Google+https://plus.google.com/u/0/b/106084399129186124597/106084399129186124597/posts
descriptionHTML:
CHRISTMAS SALE!
SAVE -50%

***

Analog watch face with a beautiful illumination and 9 unique color skins:
- emerald - the original,
- amber,
- amethyst,
- jadeite,
- ruby,
- sapphire,
- quartz,
- citrine,
- morganite.

Designed for round and square devices.

Additional features:
- various design personalization possibilities with various number layouts and time ticks,
- custom signature - type whatever you like,
- watch and phone battery indicators,
- date indicator.

Designed for Android Wear.
Supported smartwatches: LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Motorola Moto 360, Sony SmartWatch 3, Asus ZenWatch, Samsung Gear Live.

ATEKTURA Watch Faces on Google+
https://plus.google.com/u/0/b/106084399129186124597/106084399129186124597/posts
comments: I think its expensive.... But i do really love the look. Gj on being simple & original. PLEASE add a step counter into this watch face.
Very poor battery life on my Moto 360 1st generation. Down to 35% battery with about 5 hours of very little use. Uninstalled.
This watch face never shows up on my moto 360 sport no matter what I do
It worked when i first got it now it doesnt
Looks great, settings are easy, can't ask for much else.
Love the ambient face.  Thanks for a great effort.
recentChanges: Let us know if you experience any issues: contact@atektura.watch
